remarks: The operator norm function.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoofval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoofval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoofval.3 $e |- L = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmoofval.4 $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmoofval.6 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmooval $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) -> ( N ` T ) = sup ( { x | E. z e. X ( ( L ` z ) <_ 1 /\ x = ( M ` ( T ` z ) ) ) } , RR* , < ) ) $.
$d T x z $.
$d U x z $.
$d W x z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y x $.
